title: Returning From Travel Dhikr
description: Authentic supplications for Returning From Travel Dhikr
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Returning From Travel Dhikr. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 217
items.arabic: ((يُكَبِّرُ عَلَى كُلِّ شَرَفٍ ثَلاَثَ تَكْبِيرَاتٍ ثُمَّ يَقُولُ: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ، وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، آيِبُونَ، تَائِبُونَ، عَابِدُونَ، لِرَبِّنا حَامِدُونَ، صَدَقَ اللَّهُ وَعْدَهُ، وَنَصَرَ عَبْدَهُ، وَهَزَمَ الْأَحْزابَ وَحْدَهُ)).
items.transliteration: Ibn AAumar  reported that the Messenger of Allah  on return from a battle or from performing the pilgrimage would say at every high point: (Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar.) and then he would say: (La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer, ayiboona ta-iboon, AAabidoon, lirabbina hamidoon, sadaqal-lahu waAAdah, wanasara AAabdah, wahazamal-ahzaba wahdah.)
items.translation: Ibn AAumar  reported that the Messenger of Allah  on return from a battle or from performing the pilgrimage would say at every high point: (Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest.) and then he would say: (None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner.  To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent.  We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord.  Allah fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant, and single-handedly defeated the allies.)

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: ذكر السفر
